content: The "Published by HL7, Affiliates & FHIR Foundation " link on http://build.fhir.org/ now redirect to http://www.fhir.org/guides/registry/ which dose NOT have any IGs

it should. what browser are you using? it's currently broken for IE - I need to fix that, but it's not simple. And it's broken for chrome in a way I don't know how to fix - you have to manually clear the chrome cache to get it to reload the correct javascript. (I presume that the page is doing something wrong, but I don't know what it is)
Interesting. Works on Chrome. I am using the new Edge Chromium which suppose to be the same as Chrome (but apparently not).
